data.description:
🚀 **CREATE 3D ACCESSORIES AND MORE** 🚀 
- Turn your imagination into models with Sketch Force, the ultimate VR creation tool for Roblox and other 3D worlds.
- Design, build, and play with your own custom creations!
{1015276523584718}
✏️ **SKETCH YOUR WAY TO 3D MODELS** ✏️
- **Intuitive sketching tools** - just draw and watch your creations come to life
- **No complex tools or prior experience needed** - if you can draw, you can create!
- **Create surfaces from sketched outlines with ease** - simply adjust your lines to refine your models
{1745802666191820}
🎮 **ROBLOX-READY CREATIONS** 🎮
- Export directly to Roblox (RBXM files)
- Create accessories, objects, and more for your experiences
- Avatar Ready exports, including code and attachments
- Connects directly to your Roblox account
{2753125554849507}
{367717199763573}
🌟 **FEATURES THAT MAKE YOU SHINE** 🌟
- Export to multiple formats (FBX, OBJ, STL etc.) for use in Unity, VRChat, UEFN, and more
- Import reference models and images to level up your creations
- Pass-through mode for tracing real world objects
{365429206599540}
👥 **JOIN THE CREATOR COMMUNITY** 👥 
- Connect with fellow designers, share tips, and showcase your best work on our discord.
Try Sketch Force today - The 3D modelling tool that's 10x easier, 100x faster, and 1000x more fun! 🏆
{1065362031828580}

changelog.change_log: 151e87e: new tooltips for straight line and circle tool. circle tool fixes

4ba3a31: 
New: 
* Tooltips 
* Authorization widget 
* Cloud storage 
* Roblox templates export
* new viewmode icons 
* correct timestamps
f8543cd: New: Fixes: * fixed chassis offset

1da9de8: 
* fixed extrusion crashes
* added premade models 
* fixed deletion of splines
* added new intro page (export)
* added message during export
9bf5dd3: Added the ability to rename embedded material/texture

c02c1d8:
* added tutorial video(how to report bugs)
* fixed controller crash
* removed matchmaking

8f663b9: 
* added age category request. 
* fixed bug when spacebar on the android keyboard produces >

73d9e42: 
- added new tutorial video.
- added logo while video is buffering. 
- added volume bar
Fixes for widgets. Removed actors from Master level. Tooltips moved to preferences
